General.Name: KoreCoin
General.Description: KoreCoin (KORE) is an x13 algorithm alternative crypto currency. The block time is 60 seconds - the PoS rate is 8% and the PoW phase lasts 7 days. There was a premine of 0.83%.
General.Technology:
• No Premine, No IPO
  • Proofs: Network-Stake (PoS) - Anonymous Burn Destroy (PoBA)
  • Min Stake Time of 1 hour, Max Stake Time of 8 hours
  • PoW ended at Block 100.000, Mined 1,200,000 KORE
  • Minimum Transaction Fee: 0.01 KORE
  • RPC Port: 28555, P2Port: 28556
  • Confirmations: 10, Maturity: 30
